content: Ok, I am looking at the atlas_mission_nova_infrastructure.md file you generated. I think it needs to include a summary, how ever you want to structure it or combine things or whatever, you get the idea, but INFRA CLAUDE will have to know what he's building for to come up with a plan to communicate to Grok for approval! Less cycles, MORE CONTEXT! Please generated an updated PRR that includes the same format as utilized in the current version in GitHub starting with # Context and stopping according to the instructions. THIS IS HAPPENING NOW! GO!
